name: Ball Bounce (DCoolMan)
description:
Try to bounce the ball as many times on the moving platform as you can!

Use the Arrow Keys or WASD (change it in settings) to bounce the ball within the frame!

Press 'P' to pause or press the 'escape' key to pause.

This is a very simple and easy game, as it was my first ever game made in Unity.  If you have any suggestions on UI or Graphics or anything else that could help my future game developing please let me know! I only really posted this for feedback! Thanks!
